column5: QUIET, CLEAN, SAFE. Old Pearland Post Office  Adorable, eclectic bungalow in the heart of old-town Pearland. 25 minutes from Downtown Houston and 45 minutes from the beach.   Feel free to browse the my book collection, magazines, watch TV in the living room or use the computer in my study. The kitchen is also yours to use/ keep food in if you would like. Coffee and tea are provided and the room is stocked with various snacks. Perfect for the couple in town, solo or business traveler.
